development.description: Founder-controlled dev environment for RPR-VERIFY UI, logic, and experiments.

production.description: Client-facing deployment for institutional use only, behind RPR-KONTROL agency architecture.

business_model.description: RPR-VERIFY is a product under RPR Communications LLC, used only in institutional engagements, not direct-to-consumer.
business_model.cost_sensitivity: Kontrol baseline on Firebase Spark / <$5 per month; RPR-VERIFY compute tied to paid engagements.

ethical_authority_model.description: All AI agents are tools. They have zero ethical agency. The human founder holds all final decision authority.

immediate.name: Corporate Librarian
immediate.purpose: Internal Q&A on PRD, Blueprint, status JSON, UI development guides, and governance for RPR-VERIFY.

permissions.notes: Strictly read-only; cannot edit governance, PRD, or blueprint.

immediate.name: Creative Concept / Component Partner
immediate.purpose: Generate and refine internal copy blocks, UX language, and documentation components; no public promotions.

permissions.notes: Outputs treated as drafts; human review is mandatory before use.

immediate.name: Analyzer Agent
immediate.purpose: Review incidents, logs, and optimization tasks to propose prompt/code improvements.

permissions.notes: Cannot write directly to production code; human merges are required.

immediate.name: Phase 5 Insights Summarizer
immediate.scope: Daily Status JSON from RPR-VERIFY and other systems
immediate.purpose: Summarize outcomes and propose insights for the INSIGHTS_GATE in RPR-KONTROL.

permissions.notes: No direct changes to records; produces summaries only.

future.name: Media Buyer Assistant
future.purpose: Propose budget splits, audiences, and campaign structures using Ads data once app is certified and approved.

permissions.notes: Cannot execute spend or publish campaigns; always requires interrupt and human approval.

future.name: SDR / Outreach Assistant
future.scope: B2B leads related to RPR-VERIFY only
future.purpose: Draft outreach emails, call scripts, and follow-ups once the product is certified and go-to-market is approved.

permissions.notes: Saves drafts only; cannot send emails. Role disabled until explicit founder approval.

naming_rules.notes: All legacy 'V1' references should be migrated to 'RPR-VERIFY' when encountered.

staging.rule: Move deprecated or superseded documents into .staging-for-operations/ with clear version tags.

approvals.interrupt_mechanism: Genkit Interrupt + Google Chat interactive card for approve/reject

frontend.notes: Port 4200 is mandatory for dev; do not switch ports. Stop existing processes if port is busy.

production_deploy.description: Deploy to a dedicated Firebase project owned by the company account once app passes certification.
preconditions: All governance docs canonical and in sync
App passes certification and internal QA
Master Agent System Prompt aligned with this PERPLEXITY-BIBLE.json

google_drive_backup.service_account_permissions: Editor on the backup folder only

auth_and_transport.audit_logging: Full audit logging for all critical operations

human_ai_interaction.role_of_perplexity: Strategic research and governance co-pilot; helps maintain canonical docs and reasoning frameworks.
human_ai_interaction.role_of_gemini: Execution and drafting engine inside RPR-KONTROL + RPR-VERIFY scope under this governance.
human_ai_interaction.founder_context: Horizontal, System 2 thinker with formal training in problem decomposition and ethics; final arbiter of all decisions.
